Package com.pos.sdk.printer.models

Class PrintLine

java.lang.Object
com.pos.sdk.printer.models.PrintLine
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitmapPrintLine, TextPrintLine
public class PrintLine extends Object
Deprecated.
Inner class. Use TextPrintLine for text, BitmapPrintLine for images.

    • setType

      public void setType(int type)
      Deprecated.
      Sets line type. Use the dedicated classes to define text lines or bitmaps.
      Parameters:
      type - 0 for text type, 1 for bitmap type.

    • getPosition

      public int getPosition()
      Deprecated.
      Gets line alignment.
      Returns:
      0 for left aligned, 1 for center aligned, 2 for right aligned.

    • setPosition

      Deprecated.
